article:
Wishing to encourage her young son's progress on the piano, a mother took the small boy to a Paderewski concert.After they were seated, the mother saw a friend in the audience and walked  _  the aisle to greet her.  _  the opportunity to explore the wonders of the concert hall, the little boy rose and  _  explored his way through a door  _  "NO ADMITTANCE."
  _  the house's lights dimmed and the  _  was about to begin, the mother returned to her seat and discovered that her son was  _  . Suddenly, the curtains parted and spotlights focused  _  the impressive Steinway on stage.In  _  , the mother saw her little boy sitting at the keyboard, innocently picking out "Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star."
At that moment, the great piano master  _  his entrance, quickly moved to the piano, and whispered in the boy's ear, "Don't  _  ." "Keep playing." Then leaning over, Paderewski reached down with his left  _  and began filling in a bass part. Soon his right arm reached around to the  _  side of the child and he  _  a running obbligato .Together, the  _  master and the young novice transformed a  _  situation into a wonderfully creative  _  . The audience was mesmerized .
That's the way it is with God.  _  we can finish on our own is hardly noteworthy. We try our best, but the  _  aren't exactly flowing music. But  _  the hand of the Master, our life's work truly can be beautiful.
